flawed_nl_solution:
There are 12 x 5/6 = <<12*5/6=72/5>>72/5 girls who are reading.
So, 12 - 72/5 = <<12-72/5=-12/5>>-12/5 girls are not reading.
There are 10 x 4/5 = <<10*4/5=8>>8 boys who are reading.
So, 10 - 8 = <<10-8=2>>2 boys are not reading.
Thus, there are a total of -12/5 girls + 2 boys = <<-12/5+2=-2/5>>-2/5 students who are not reading.
#### -2/5

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 72/5. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
